join.title: Why would I want to join the Itqan community?
join.answer: The Itqan community is a great place to be surrounded by passionate developers who are looking to develop their skills and serve a greater faith-based purpose. Through connecting with like-minded others, and getting feedback on your work and software.

support.title: Will I get professional support?
support.answer: Yes, you'll have access to the community discussion board to get feedback, review your software, and learn from others.

topics.title: What topics can I ask about here?
topics.answer: The Itqan community is dedicated to professional and amateur programmers. The best questions in our community usually contain a portion of source code, but if your question covers a specific programming problem, programming algorithm, or commonly used programming tools; and is a practical, answerable, unique problem in software development, you're in the right place to ask what's on your mind.

evaluationGuide.title: The Guidebook for Evaluating Emerging Quranic Technology Projects
evaluationGuide.description:
In the era of technological innovation, this guide represents a unique tool for anyone seeking to evaluate emerging Quranic tech projects or assess their own project. It offers a clear and robust evaluation methodology that assists both evaluators and project owners in conducting an accurate assessment of the quality of these projects and ensuring the sustainability of their impact.

Contents of the Guide:
The guide includes an objective evaluation matrix based on a precise analytical approach, along with detailed evaluation criteria and axes, most notably:
- Originality of the idea and its ability to meet current and future needs.
- Team competence and the integration of roles and expertise.
- Maturity of the prototype, readiness for implementation, and practical suitability.
- Project sustainability and the quality of work and growth plans.

How to Make Use of This Guide?
Rely on it as a comprehensive reference for objective and accurate project evaluation.
Benefit from its criteria to identify strengths and weaknesses in your project and improve it.
Develop a clear vision of quality and excellence standards in Quranic tech projects.

Towards promising Quranic tech projects.
Download the guide now.

suraApi.title: Sura API
suraApi.description: This API offers comprehensive access to the content of the Surah application, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate Quranic data into their applications. It allows for the retrieval of detailed information about various projects, including content specific to surahs, pages, and verses, whether by individual number or multiple ranges. The API also facilitates access to word data, including word images, making it a powerful tool for developers aiming to create content-rich Quranic applications.
suraApi.author: Tafsir Center for Qur'anic Studies

devPlatform.description: The King Fahd Glorious Qurâan Printing Complex offers a specialized platform for developers, providing advanced digital resources and tools to facilitate the integration of Holy Qur'an content into various applications and software. This platform includes high-quality digital copies of Mus'haf al-Madinah in vector format, ideal for printing, software development, and educational systems.It also supplies Unicode Uthmanic Fonts supporting various narrations (such as Hafs, Warsh, Shu'bah, Qaloun, Duri, and Susi), ensuring accurate and aesthetic display of Quranic text on smart devices and digital platforms. Additionally, the platform provides comprehensive databases with detailed information for each verse, including jozz number, surah name, page number, and verse text in multiple formats. Developers can also access trusted resources like Tafseer Muyassar and Muyassar of Ghareeb Al-Quran, along with versatile tools in formats like Excel, JSON, and PDF, all aimed at enriching digital Quranic content and fostering innovation in Qur'an-related applications.
